表格技工表的代码预览

drop table if exists artisan;

/*==============================================================*/
/* Table: artisan */
/*==============================================================*/
create table artisan
(
artisanid varchar(50) not null,
teamid int,
starsid int,
isgroup bool,
aname varchar(20),
asex int,
aphone varchar(20),
loginaid varchar(20),
loginapaw varchar(20),
idcaid varchar(20),
araddress varchar(50),
craft varchar(100),
maintainBrand varchar(100),
primary key (artisanid)
);

alter table artisan add constraint FK_技工星级与技工 foreign key (starsid)
references stars (starsid) on delete restrict on update restrict;

alter table artisan add constraint FK_班组与技工 foreign key (teamid)
references team (teamid) on delete restrict on update restrict;
